creator: roxspring@imapmail.org
text:
Mentioned this on list last week but haven't seen an issue / commit so following
up here for posterity.

Most tasks display no output if nothing has been achieved but depend insists on
displaying "Deleted 0 out of date files in 0 seconds" and interrupting the
otherwise blank screen.

Patch from thread to follow.

Created attachment 10724
The ACTUAL patch rather than the tarball sent to the list
creator: roxspring@imapmail.org
